title: Encounter the Enlightened -- Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev
description:
Sadhguru talks series "Encounter the Enlightened".
Q&A session from a Maha Sathsang (gathering of over 100,000 people)
Excerpts from the talk are provided below:
"...Mind - you know. The function of the mind to some extent. Aathma what do you know? Once again you are talking about stories that other people told you.
We can tell you any kind of story, but please do not talk about things which are not in your experience. The moment you start talking about what is not in your experience, to put it very bluntly, you are just lying to yourself - isn&#039;&#039;t it? Yes? If you are talking about things which are not in your living experience are you not lying to yourself? Yes or No?
So dont talk about Aathmas. About Mind we can see. Aathma - you cannot see right now. Does this mean to say it does not exist? It does not matter whether it exists or not. It is not in your experience right now. So if you want to experience anything beyond physical nature obviously you cannot experience it with the five sense organs...."
